title: MY ACC GOT RESTED FROM LVL 15 to 1 and i lost everything !!!!
body: well as the title says my acc got rested and i lost everything on it wht is that and did it happen and how to get it back to the orignal state :')

replies.body: That definitely sounds pretty weird, but if you shoot me the name of the account you're worried about I can check up on it to see what happened.

oh that would be cool sorry for the late reply i was asleep my account is hockagi777
ps: it was lvl25 not lvl15 .. and i got rakan and gp on it as i remember .. i got star guardian word skin got it from a chest maybe this will help at ur research ^^

It doesn't look like the account hockagi777 has ever been over level 2 or had any purchases on it except for receiving the Worlds Icon. Let me know if that wasn't the right account you were looking for, or you can reach out to the EUW account agents in a ticket.

yea that is the right account and yea I started playing again yesterday and got that icon ... I told u everything had been reset to 0 and I lost every progress on it :'( I will try to search the match history of my friends I may find some clues
